name: CYCOM: Cybernet Combat
description:
It's been 2 years since the first self conscious AI were created. All seemed fine, until one day, the AI rebelled. Amidst the chaos, a digital system CYCOM, was created and spread across the internet for everyone to try and destroy the AI threat. All have failed, will you as well?

CYCOM: Cybernet Combat is a fast paced strategy game, combining the real time battling of shooters and the strategy of trading card games. CYCOM is currently in Early Access, but with your support the game can grow to include more levels and even Player vs. Player Mode.

Key Features
Battle Rogue AI in the Cybernet with your LemonBuster Weapon!
Strategize and Power Up with your Custom Programs!
Move and dodge relentless enemy fire!
Discover enemy weaknesses to defeat your enemies!
Defeat the boss of the Cybernet!
Learn to engage in Cybernet Combat in Tutorial Mode!
Speed run and beat your best time in Story Mode!
Beat your high score in Infinite Mode!
